Class Terminal

    • Method Detail

      • prompt

        public static java.lang.String prompt(java.lang.String promptString)
        This is the prompt function. It is used for reading in input from the keyboard. It is used in all terminals to determine what feature the given person would like to use.
        Parameters:
        String - promptString - A user generated response that prompt takes in.

      • prompt

        public static java.lang.String prompt(java.lang.String promptString,
                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> args)
        This is another prompt function but passes a List with it. Functions identical to prompt(string).
        Parameters:
        String - promptString - A user generated response that prompt takes in.
        List - args - This is used for JUnit testing to make sure certain functions are working properly.

      • pressEnterToContinue

        public static void pressEnterToContinue()
        This function is for when the user needs to press enter in order to go to the next step. It is much like most websites enter function.

      • run

        public abstract void run()
